title: Header logo function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that header appears
AND Inside MLB logo appears
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to any other page on the site
AND clicks on the logo
custom_expected:
THEN user is redirected back to main page
AND the redirect occurs in the same tab.

title: Header search function: type and enter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that header appears
AND search field appears
AND user has clicked or tapped inside the search field
custom_steps:
WHEN user types in the field (whole or partial words, letters and/or numbers)
FOR EXAMPLE, search for: base
AND user hits Enter/Go/Search
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects within the same tab to a search results page
AND the typed characters appear in the new search field
AND the typed characters are highlighted yellow in each document appearing in the results
AND the documents come from all over the Inside MLB website
AND every document title or summary contains the typed characters

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19219)

title: Header user elements: dropdown appearance
custom_preconds: GIVEN that 3 user elements appear
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps anywhere on the 3 elements
custom_expected:
THEN a box appears below the blue header box
AND dropdown box touches the bottom border of the blue header box
AND dropdown box is white with black border
AND dropdown box has shadow 
AND the words SIGN OUT in all caps appear in the box in black

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19039)

title: Header user elements: dropdown click/tap
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user elements have appeared
AND user has clicked or tapped anywhere on the elements
AND dropdown box has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps anywhere on the dropdown box
custom_expected:
THEN user is redirected to the login page in the same tab
AND using the back button does not restore access to the site.

title: Header hamburger button open
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport below 991px
AND header has appeared
AND hamburger button has appeared (three short horizontal lines)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the button
custom_expected:
THEN button background changes to gray
AND the 3 lines do not have a 4th line (button is not underlined)
AND the red side nav expands to show labels as well as icons.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19043)

title: Header hamburger button close
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport below 991px
AND header has appeared
AND user has clicked or tapped on button
AND gray background has appeared on button
AND side nav has expanded to show icons and labels
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on hamburger button a second time
custom_expected:
THEN gray background of button disappears
AND side nav collapses to just show icons.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19044)

title: Login page appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that URL has loaded

(URL is insidestg.mlb.com)
custom_expected:
THEN tab reads Login - Inside MLB
AND background image fills screen
AND background image is static (not video)
AND blue transparent box is horizontally centered
AND blue box contains 3 horizontally centered elements: InsideMLB logo, white box containing User Name prompt in gray, white box containing Password prompt in gray
AND left aligned with the boxes is a checkbox with the label Remember Me in white bold-face
AND right aligned with the boxes is a question mark in a white circle with the label Forgot Password in white all-caps
AND the Forgot Password icon and label are underlined
AND horizontally centered at the bottom is a blue button with white border and SIGN IN label in white all caps
AND no elements are overlapping each other

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19374)

title: Login page: BOC only
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is not a BOC-permitted user
AND user is on the login page

(To test, use your mlb.com account)
custom_steps: WHEN user submits username and password
custom_expected:
THEN site does not allow access
AND page redirects to an error message: We're sorry, your account has not been enabled for Inside MLB.
AND below the message is a BACK link

AND WHEN user clicks or taps on the BACK link
THEN page redirects within the same tab to the login page.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19532)

title: Footer logo function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that footer has appeared
AND that InsideMLB logo has appeared within the footer
AND user is on any page in the site
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on the footer logo
custom_expected: THEN page redirects to the Main Page in the same tab

title: Nav load appearance
custom_preconds: GIVEN that main page has loaded
custom_expected:
THEN nav appears on the left side of the screen
AND nav extends to the footer
AND nav is collapsed, showing only icons
AND nav is red 
AND elements are white
AND lines separating elements have shadows

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19199)

title: Nav appearance above 991px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is in a viewport above 991px
AND user is on the main page
AND nav has loaded 
AND nav is collapsed, showing only icons
custom_expected:
THEN nav has 7 icons
AND the icons from top to bottom are: hamburger button, house, org chart, tickets, squares, bound paper, person
AND there is a carat pointing left at the house icon 

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19479)

title: Nav function: open, above 991px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport above 991px
AND nav has appeared
AND nav is collapsed, showing only icons
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the hamburger button
custom_expected:
THEN nav expands to show 6 labels
AND the hamburger button does not have a label
AND the 6 labels from top to bottom are: Home, Departments, MLB Events, MLB Apps, MLB Calendar, Directory
AND labels are left aligned with each other
AND labels are in all caps
AND the carat by the Home label has increased in size

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19480)

title: Right nav loads
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
custom_expected:
THEN nav appears at the right side of the screen
AND it is a white box
AND it does not overlap with the center section white box
AND no department information appears below the Apps in the center section
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19048)

title: Right nav appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
AND right-side nav has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN all text in the right nav is dark blue
AND there are 2 headers in all caps: top header = My Departments, bottom header = Recent Documents
AND any text listed below the headers is upper case/lower case
AND any text listed below the headers is underlined
AND all text is left aligned
AND no text overlaps each other
AND no text overlaps the box
AND no text is cut off unless there is an ellipses present (...)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19617)

title: Right nav function: links select
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
AND right-side nav has appeared
AND nav contains text that is not an all-caps header
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on any text that is not a header
custom_expected:
IF text was a department name
THEN page redirects to the correct department page in the same tab
OR
IF text was a document name
THEN page redirects to the correct document in the same tab

title: Events carousel: select event name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on main page
AND events carousel has appeared
AND carousel has an event label with name and dates/times
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the event name
custom_expected: THEN page redirects in the same tab to the event page corresponding to the clicked or tapped name

title: Events carousel: See Event button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the main page
AND the carousel has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps a SEE EVENT button
custom_expected: THEN user is redirected within the same tab to the individual event page matching the selection

title: Featured Chatter function: click
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on main page
AND Featured Chatter has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on a chatter name
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the relevant chatter

title: Apps section function: click
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on main page
AND Apps section has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on logo
OR user clicks on app name
custom_expected:
THEN a new tab opens
AND page loads in that new tab
AND the page corresponds to the app that was clicked upon
AND page is a login page
AND clicking on app name and logo produce the same new page

title: Scroll bar: manual function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on any page in the site
AND scroll bar has appeared
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks and holds or presses on the scroll bar
AND user moves up or down
custom_expected:
THEN scroll bar moves up or down accordingly
AND main page scrolls up or down accordingly

title: Search field function: search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Departments page
AND Search field has appeared
AND user has clicked or tapped within the Search field
custom_steps:
WHEN the user types a whole word in the Search field
OR user types a partial word
AND user hits Enter/Go/Return
custom_expected:
THEN some Department boxes disappear
AND the only boxes that remain have titles that contain the characters entered in the Search field
AND the boxes are aligned with each other
AND the white box minimizes to fit the new configuration
AND the Search field retains the characters typed

Specific test: searching for "comm" produces Communications, Community Affairs, and Office of the Commissioner department boxes.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19209)

title: Grid appearance
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on the Global Departments page
custom_expected:
THEN department boxes appear beneath the Search field
AND the boxes are horizontally and vertically aligned with each other
AND the boxes are evenly spaced
AND boxes maintain even spacing as the viewport changes (the number of columns reduces)
AND each box has a shadow
AND each box has a black border
AND each box has a label in black all-caps
AND labels with more than 1 line are left aligned
AND each box has a Major League Baseball image in the bottom right corner
AND the MLB images are different colors in each box
AND no elements overlap any other
AND the boxes are arranged in alphabetical order, left to right and top to bottom

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19389)

title: Global Events - select event from grid
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Events page
AND event boxes appear in a grid
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on a white label / Event title in an event box
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the individual event page that matches the label selected

title: Event page - appearance at or above 992px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
AND user was on the Global Events page
AND user selected an event
AND user was the Owner of that event
AND the event's page appeared
custom_expected:
THEN a header box appears at the top of the page
AND the background of the header box is an image
AND the image is proportional (not squished or stretched)
AND elements within the header box are vertically centered
AND to the left inside the header box is the event title
AND the event title is white and bold-faced and the largest font on the page
AND to the right inside the header box are 3 buttons: Follow, Update, Delete
AND the buttons are evenly spaced from each other
AND the button labels are white and all-capped
AND the buttons have white borders
AND the Follow button is dark blue
AND the Update button is black
AND the Delete button is red
AND below the event title inside the header box is a toggle: Welcome/Attendees
AND the toggle is left-aligned with the event title
AND the toggle is white and bold-faced
AND the Welcome option is underlined by default 
AND below the header box are 2 columns
AND the left column has a dark blue header: Overview
AND beneath the Overview header is a set of directions (see screenshot below)
AND the event title, Overview header, and directions are left aligned
AND at the top of the right column is a red button
AND the button has a white all-caps label: I Will Not Attend (viewing as an Owner who created the event, the Owner is already marked as I will attend)
AND below the Not Attend button is a dark blue box
AND the dark blue box has a white bold-faced all-caps header: Time & Location
AND beneath that header are 3 white semi-bold-faced sub-headers: Starts, Ends, Location
AND beneath each sub-header is white non-bold-faced data the event creator chose when creating the event
AND the day is formatted MM/DD/YYYY
AND the time is formatted as 12-hour hh:mm AM/PM
AND the header, sub-headers, and data are all left-aligned

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19503)

title: Event page - appearance for non-Owners
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user was on the Global Events page
AND user selected an event
AND user was not the originator of that event
AND the event's page appeared
custom_expected:
THEN user will see the Follow button
AND user will not see the Update button 
AND user will not see the Delete button
AND user will not see the Welcome/Attendees toggle

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19367)

title: Search function: type and enter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Apps page

custom_steps:

AND user hits Return/Go/Enter
custom_expected:
THEN apps on the page are replaced by the relevant apps
AND the apps are relevant because their app names contain the sequence of characters typed into the Search field
AND the characters remain in the Search field

title: Directory appearance at or above 992px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 992px
AND user is on Global Directory page
AND user is on the first page of the Directory
custom_expected:
THEN page has a white box
AND above the white box is a dark blue, all-caps header that reads: Members
AND the header is left aligned with the left border of the white box
AND inside the box at the top is a Search field
AND the Search field is horizontally centered
AND inside the Search field is a gray magnifying glass icon and a gray label that reads: Search
AND no elements of the Search field overlap each other
AND below the Search field is the Filter dropdown box
AND the dropdown box has a black boldface all-caps label that reads: All Departments
AND below the dropdown box is a grid of contact boxes
AND 10 contact boxes appear on the page
AND the grid has 2 columns
AND the right borders of the right column boxes are aligned with the right border of the dropdown box
AND the space between the right column boxes and the white box right border equals the space between the left column boxes and white box left border
AND below the contact boxes, to the left, is dark blue pagination: 1- 10 of x (where x is the total contacts)
AND there is a space between the hyphen and the 10
AND below the contact boxes, to the right, are white boxes with gray borders and red numbers
AND a white box with a red label that reads: Next
AND a white box with a red label that reads: Last
AND the boxes are top and bottom aligned with each other
AND the box marked 1 has a dark blue background
AND in that box the number 1 is white
AND no element on the page overlaps another

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19062)
![](index.php?/attachments/get/19063)

title: Contact box appearance at or above 768px
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or above 768px
AND user is on Global Directory page
AND contacts have appeared
custom_expected:
THEN each contact box is gray with a white border
AND each contact box has up to 8 elements: image, name, title, department, number label, number, email label, email address
AND the image is on the left side of the contact box
AND the image has its own gray border
AND the image's right border is the contact box's left border
AND the image is proportionate (not stretched or squeezed)
AND the name is dark blue, bold faced, underlined, and initial capped
And the title is gray and initial capped
AND the department is dark blue in a white box with a dark blue border
AND the number label is dark blue and initial capped and reads: Office Number: (with colon)
AND there is a space between the number label and the number
AND the number is dark blue and formatted: (xxx) xxx-xxxx [fix is in progress to make this happen]
AND there is a space between the ) and the next number
AND there is no space on either side of the dash
AND the email label is dark blue and initial capped and reads: Office Email: (with colon)
AND there is a space between the email label and the email address
AND the email address is red and underlined
AND the email address is an mlb.com address
AND the email address does not have capital letters
AND the name, title, department box, number label, and email label are all left aligned

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19624)

title: Follow button - appearance

GIVEN that user is on a Department Home page
AND Follow button has appeared
custom_expected:

AND button spans the width of its column
AND 2 elements are centered horizontally and vertically on the button
AND the element on the left is a red checkmark in a white circle
AND the element on the right is the word Follow
AND the word is white and all-capped
AND no elements overlap each other

custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on a Chat title
